meanings.definition: In a way that lacks drama or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The play ended undramatically, with no surprises or twists.
meanings.sent2: She undramatically finished her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat undramatically napped through the entire movie.
meanings.sent4: The meeting concluded undramatically, without any heated arguments.
meanings.sent5: The sunset faded undramatically into the horizon, painting the sky in soft pastels.

meanings.definition: Without any dramatic or theatrical elements.
meanings.sent1: The undramatic movie was a simple story about everyday life.
meanings.sent2: Her undramatic outfit consisted of jeans and a plain t-shirt.
meanings.sent3: The undramatic cake was just a basic vanilla sponge with no fancy decorations.
meanings.sent4: His undramatic speech was straight to the point, without any grand gestures.
meanings.sent5: The undramatic painting depicted a quiet countryside scene with no bold colors.
